title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 190.3 - Records to be maintained
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 190.3 - Records to be maintained

State Regulations

The following records of every business transaction must be
maintained at the principal office of the vendor for a period of three
years: (a) duplicate signed copies of
all contracts; (b) copies of
notices to the Department of State pursuant to section
190.4
of this Part; (c) copies of landlord's authorization for
each apartment to which prospective tenants are referred; and
(d) duplicate signed copies of escrow
agreements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
190.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
